item.title: Setting Up A Site Using Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.author: Jim Shadrick
item.description: Background I have been wanting to setup a static website so that I could begin writing and publishing some articles on a personal blog, but I did not want to have to pay for a hosted solution. I also did not need a full featured CMS like WordPress. About two years ago I was reviewing several static website generators like Jekyll, Hugo, Gatsby, etc. and Hugo was touted as the fastest framework and seemed to be the easiest to install and setup.
